      • buildCassandraClient

        public static CassandraClient buildCassandraClient(ConnectionParameters connectionParameters)
                                            throws org.mule.api.ConnectionException
        Connect to Cassandra Cluster specified by provided host IP address and port number.
        Parameters:
        connectionParameters - the connection parameters
        Returns:
        CassandraClient created
        Throws:
        org.mule.api.ConnectionException - if any error occurs when trying to connect

        public com.datastax.driver.core.TableMetadata fetchTableMetadata(String keyspaceUsed,
                                                        String tableName)
        Fetches table metadata using DataStax java driver, based on the keyspace provided
        Parameters:
        keyspaceUsed - the Keyspace to fetch from
        tableName - the Table from keyspace
        Returns:
        the table metadata as returned by the driver.

      • delete

        public void delete(String keySpace,
          String table,
          List<String> entity,
          Map<String,Object> whereClause)
            throws CassandraDBException
        DELETE command can be used to: - remove one or more columns from one or more rows in a table; - remove the entire row (one or more); - if column_name refers to a collection (a list or map), the parameter in parentheses indicates the term in the collection to be deleted
        Parameters:
        keySpace - Keyspace to delete from
        table - Table to delete from
        entity - Entity to be removed
        whereClause - WHERE clause condition
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if something goes wrong

        Throws:
        CassandraDBException
